summary: FUEL PUMP MODULE MAY CRACK AND CAUSE FUEL TO LEAK AND CAR TO CATCH FIRE. I LIVE IN THE STATE OF OHIO . I HAVE TO 2 CHILDREN THAT I DRIVE WITH IN MY CAR.
